about.title: AL Says is committed to social and environmental initiatives to strengthen the social fabric within the products and services offerings of the regions.
about.description: At AL Says, we intend to achieve this through our processes, high quality products brands and services, and the distribution channels towards the resource efficient, Zero emission, and the reduced environmental warming future.

statistics.name: Clients
statistics.description: Trusted Partners in Public & Private Sectors

ourProductAndService.description: From procurement to project execution, AL says Trading Co. delivers tailored solutions with unmatched reliability and professionalism.
ourProductAndService.title: Delivering Value Through Services

productsAndServices.name: Flooring Mats
productsAndServices.description: At AL Says specialized in flooring solutions distribute high quality of rubber mats for gyms, swimming pools, stable, and industrial mats including the PP mats and all types of coir mats. AL Says able to provide customized solutions on this for limitless scale of supply. Also, AL Says, provide with the installations of mats if quired by the customer
services: Workforce augmentation (Provision of Skilled labour like Carpenters, Electricians, Plumbers)
Procurement of essentials and LSA consumables

productsAndServices.name: FMCG Products
productsAndServices.description: AL Says distributes high quality of brands of products under fast moving consumer goods (FMCG), women and baby care, hygienic care, safety care, and medical care. AL Says, represents high quality of brands originally manufacture from Turky.
services: Design and build of Camps (Wet and Dry Trailers, Ablution Units etc)

productsAndServices.name: Automotive Parts & Consumables
productsAndServices.description: AL Says distribute Air conditioning parts for light vehicles and other spare parts for mechanical and the general parts as well. This includes compressor, evaporator, condenser, fan, valves, fan motor, cooling parts, A/C oils, radiators, and other. In addition, distribute also parts for trucks and heavy equipment such as engine filters, pump, horses, hydraulic parts, transmission parts, tires, brake parts, lubricants, consumables, and other. AL Says focuses on high quality world known and reputed brands on this both aftermarket and the genuine parts as well.
services: Supply and installation of Generators (Both 230 V and 110 V)
Design, supply and installation of electrical panels
Design, supply and installation of solar panels

whatWeAre.title: Driven by excellence and built on trust, we deliver reliable solutions that meet the needs of modern industries across Saudi Arabia.
whatWeAre.description: We have the capability to design, procure and install electrical systems that includes design and install of panels, cabling and power generation systems for camps and onshore rigs. Some of our capabilities are:
